name: Dude! Where's my skull?
description:
Dude! Where's my skull?

Up to 4 players online multiplayer.

If you get hit you lose your skull. You have 20 seconds to collect it before you die!

Watch out! If you lose your skull, your controls get scrambled!

GMTK Game Jam 2020
This year's theme is "Out of control"

Created in under 48 hours with Unity

Programming - Samu Aapa
Character art and animation - Matti Häkli
Environment art - Miska Häkli
User interface and music - Juhana Venemies

Special thanks to:

Bardent (Character movement in Unity (youtu.be/QPiZSTEuZnw)
Jesse Munguia (Character art reference: //jesse-m.itch.io/skeleton-pack)

MortMort (Pixel graphics tutorials: youtube.com/channel/UCsn9MzwyPKeCE6MEGtMU4gg)
